descriptions.o-fd9cd61dd2ba4d74871b7d57dd1d25e8: Unique identifier of the product in the product domain.
descriptions.o-ba7ba9ff49c44042ad9bd14b59b35421: The name of the product. It could be the same as the name of the Product Offering
descriptions.o-5c179858d58745bc9d3437c1aab84812: The description of the product. It could be copied from the description of the Product Offering.
descriptions.o-39a4663a9605414da6918828c1991e86: The state of the product in accordance with the product lifecycle.
descriptions.o-9b598a7cd07a456c991f2072df09154b: Serial number for the product. This is typically applicable to tangible products e.g. Broadband Router.
descriptions.o-cc0d300a378a4e119ff236644d795cd8: Start date is when the product instance is created in the inventory database with a timestamp.
descriptions.o-3a67bc119c8844b695d8c9eefb6d4ab2: The date when the product was ordered
descriptions.o-a2393da941d54c198d443dc4a5983316: Termination date (commercial) is when the product has been terminated (when the disconnect in the product order has been processed). Timestamp of when the status changes to terminated.
descriptions.o-cc838397988d4919862fe2271ccad4ed: A set of related places associated to the product.
descriptions.o-9fbfe7f981474c4ebb04dc580c748927: A reference to the product offering associated to the product.
descriptions.o-2a5cc613994745fcb4b62f4fff4b6c46: The associated product spec, as referenced by an id.
descriptions.o-b142cbb5521a44b69b032573bbe13343: A a list of name value pairs to list the various relevant characteristics of the instantiated product
descriptions.o-8ea3c17dfbed4fa7b3968e4a1b6a1795: The product has a product relationship with other product(s).
descriptions.o-55d697c3ac0949a186e832903a7c0d88: A reference to the billing account(s) associated to the product.
descriptions.o-2d7ac4c581294d73a5eeb7e4101f58ea: A set of related parties associated to the product.
descriptions.o-43d88760e0494e6d8e2b7534d3aff51f: List of resource reference. RealizingResource is a link to the resource that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-14d15fea754743f68516c1ad52d23d8b: List of service references. RealizingService is a link to the service that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-9b05757e8106415b8d4fa03aa5c1854b: A list of all applicable prices for the product, it’s an override of the default one specified in the ProductOffering
descriptions.o-2b63c57e74c74ba7842371e12ac23e72: A list of agreement references . Agreement item will contain the terms and conditions for the product including the product term
descriptions.o-b1a6dec987434195817c949a3c4bf452: callback urn, for instance an url http://yourdomain/listener/api/v1/event
descriptions.o-5c4379944a63418888f299007113496f: It defines the set of goods and services, offered to a market by a Party that is playing an appropriate PartyRole, which is purchased by a Customer.
descriptions.o-947f5ceed8aa4baaa3f51e61be645f71: If true, the product is visible by the customer
descriptions.o-ecd3109bc8cc42b68796aff42ac6712c: If true, the product is a ProductBundle which is an instantiation of a BundledProductOffering. If false, the product is a ProductComponent which is an instantiation of a SimpleProductOffering
descriptions.o-073f783b0cac405c88b865a98ed41e47: Place answers the question "Where?" It is an abstract class.
descriptions.o-c96188cbff9e416ea56935675cce7623: The role that the place plays, e.g. "Billing Address", "UNI Site", or "ENNI Site".
descriptions.o-9c585d343a694c77b5fb8bfcef0b7edf: A product offering defines the commercial terms under which a product specification may be instantiated
descriptions.o-d97b9dbaf5244eba84b8dd0ff8809fb9: A unique product offering identifier. This identifier is provided by the seller and communicated to the buyer during the on-boarding process.
descriptions.o-ec40fcb482ec4a1cbdd3587426d81e15: A ProductSpec describes the invariant properties (i.e., features) that a given set of Products MAY have. These properties provide the information needed to plan, construct, allocate, and/or retire the Services and Resources from the operator environment needed to deliver the Product.
descriptions.o-ae521a055c20468abb7862243edbe586: A unique identifier of the product spec.
descriptions.o-7f04e1742f304f2e9504227f42823a6e: Agreement reference. An agreement represents a contract or arrangement, either written or verbal and sometimes enforceable by law, such as a service level agreement or a customer price agreement. An agreement involves a number of other business entities, such as products, services, and resources and/or their specifications
descriptions.o-d978a39be3e749efae5a48f225f89fe9: A product has relationships to other products.
descriptions.o-e00b1c732d034a61b7113f1936555877: Indicates whether the type of relationship is "bundled", "reliesOn", or "comesFrom"
descriptions.o-a293ed7c330d4b12b9ea88406df3d4a5: A reference to a product id
descriptions.o-35b7e0b6af404621869b6a540bb38c46: A list of places used to defined a place useful for the product (for example a delivery geographical place)
descriptions.o-8a035cf3c76642288e34392ddd5e26cd: An arrangement that a customer has with an enterprise that provides products to the customer.
descriptions.o-433d5fc1c8274d59a4e13b8992f1aa55: An unique identifier of the billing account
descriptions.o-6ece12a06df9498ba2ba0261730ebb16: An entity or organization that is related to the product, such as the buyer, the seller, etc.
descriptions.o-3322dc6665c14dbdbedacb550ee9b8f6: A unique identifier of the related party.
descriptions.o-fc784593674b4dd79b0f3f499e5cb550: Validity period of the related party
descriptions.o-2adc7a287db74058bf2ef2479204e08f: RealizingResource reference. RealizingResource is a link to the resource that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-f58ceae3ff2a407da398a4a0e301f0f5: RealizingService reference. RealizingService is a link to the service that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-aa4944f2883944869b7344d52381f7d8: A short descriptive name such as "Subscription price"
descriptions.o-533e095b876140e0a4b2000f5467acc9: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this product price
descriptions.o-55f4a89f4481494faa8455641c4bcec0: A category that describes the price, such as recurring, discount, allowance, penalty, and so forth
descriptions.o-9d34c6d253304684b3fe7b4d78a4d5d7: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage to apply for order item price and price alteration.
descriptions.o-0873af6c0bd44185943c085d8a59eb94: A prod price alteration is an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for a Product
descriptions.o-6063cef868524573a84449c5eea29e16: Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage applied for price and price alteration
descriptions.o-8a613e3728ea4eca9d710149d53737cb: A string used as a code for specifying the currency associated to the given amounts. The ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency (for example USD for US dollar or EUR for Euro)
descriptions.o-ad4491e0ab0a48659fb16cda4aa93539: All taxes excluded amount (expressed in the given currency)
descriptions.o-a1aec672f19d47378fb7a67127e88558: All taxes included amount (expressed in the given currency)
descriptions.o-eccfe609ab4241b1a36d8d221bffa302: Is an amount, usually of money, that modifies the price charged for a Product
descriptions.o-57de0e3378394c8d99bce1084f70a6b4: A short descriptive name such as "Monthly discount"
descriptions.o-a70ea3aab45a4148b97dc535202492a5: A narrative that explains in detail the semantics of this ProdPriceAlteration
descriptions.o-bc0ab8b12734460a9dff5456c9dcb369: Duration during which the ProdPriceAlteration applies on the ProductPrice (for instance 2 months free of charge for the recurring charge)
descriptions.o-f11f802098264d72a339d8bc1e63509d: A category that describes the price such as recurring, one shot and so forth
descriptions.o-e9882395e2c54a57a279503e4208c09b: Priority level for applying this alteration among all the defined alterations
descriptions.o-a2d59acba33047e495af1e9ddb992c37: A price. Provides all amounts (tax included, duty free, tax rate), used currency and percentage to apply for order item price and price alteration
descriptions.o-a4b66c96158541bfa4438d77b3ab8877: This operation is used to retrieve one or more product inventory instances based upon filter criteria specified on input.
descriptions.o-748ceeb5b5fe4dcf8f1d44bde574a042: This operation is used to retrieve a single product inventory instance based upon a specified product id.
descriptions.o-b04722321a334952973aec775f0f2a82:
This operation creates a product entity. This operation is available only to ADMIN API users.
Mandatory and non mandatory attributes and additionnal rules are provided in the specifications document.
descriptions.o-3dedd8e429614ded90c4a131d3ec6e57:
This operation allows partial updates of a product entity. This operation is available only to ADMIN API users.
Support of json/merge (https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7386) is mandatory, support of json/patch (http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5789) is optional.
Patchable and not patchable attributes are provided in the specifications document.
descriptions.o-8a9843c5b57d464db2109677cc9615a7: This operation deletes a product entity. This operation is available only to ADMIN API users
descriptions.o-bf10dfe808d044868e8731f20e3a8ac8: Reference to schema describing the productSpec
descriptions.o-04f32afadb7540aeb9c6cd7c7002ffc5: A site is a place that has (existing, planned or former) physical things or characteristics of interest to the service provider.
descriptions.o-0c89dc46501043d0a97d3873f36d23b2: A GeographicPoint defines a geographic point through coordinates
descriptions.o-09fe34bffb7a497dbc37f35eca8d537a: A GeographicLocation allows describing through coordinate(s) a point, a line or a space
descriptions.o-1c44bb74c00f4dc0a29ecdffec07a039: It is used for addressing within a property in an urban area (country properties are often defined differently). It may refer to a building, a building cluster, or a floor of a multistory building.
descriptions.o-a11a92a92ba640af8334216f1acf8650:
Structured textual way of describing how to find a Property in an urban area (country properties are often
defined differently).
Defined in the Carrier Ethernet Ordering as a FieldedAddress. MEF extension adds FormattedAddressLine1 and FormattedAddressLine2 attributes for FormattedAddress
descriptions.o-52045a9781c544f586cce92759fce95f: A specialization of the place class. The type to which the place is referring. This may be "Site", "FormattedAddress", "FieldedAddress", "ReferencedAddress", or "GeographicLocation".
descriptions.o-91d4d9622d5a46229cc934fe6a7c0617: An enumeration of the entities that are part of this order expressed in terms of a Product Offering or a Product (for a change order).
descriptions.o-f3af7d46bc324c679e9c5f2af38ac175: The associated product order item that has created, or modified the product.
descriptions.o-865fb870b2774a21bff1915d0d209703: The type of product if specialization
descriptions.o-ecda77f4d4c14f2cb6e89ab21888992a: the Base Type of the product if specialization
descriptions.o-85f541c4e7564199a0df35d57d18b4ff: A pointer to a file describing extension attributes (if used)
descriptions.o-80e54f288d584f6abf0f81ef4f331af7: The telephone number of the related party.
descriptions.o-3c789bfe397f4e08990a13cce379ac54: The telephone extension of the related party.
descriptions.o-74b4c0e7f2ac401f95d85b54d702c12b: The email address of the related party.
descriptions.o-edd222ad2ca04fb58d7ae3962fc025d0: The name of the product. It could be the same as the name of the Product Offering
descriptions.o-533096bcb8034f2aafb665ddf10d96ed: The description of the product. It could be copied from the description of the Product Offering.
descriptions.o-742ec394f2d048ee9d7c693b1dd8de81: Serial number for the product. This is typically applicable to tangible products e.g. Broadband Router.
descriptions.o-968e7e214bdd4952965635db42172c04: If true, the product is visible by the customer
descriptions.o-6b419392019d4dd8924eb48d306567e5: If true, the product is a ProductBundle which is an instantiation of a BundledProductOffering. If false, the product is a ProductComponent which is an instantiation of a SimpleProductOffering
descriptions.o-08f63010b8e84e159d06c094978827c8: The date from which the product starts
descriptions.o-44f9701425c84c01b70c9e0a7325d7b5: The date when the product was ordered
descriptions.o-dc1822a924524d3eb75e252313331af7: The date when the product was terminated. Not applicable to active products
descriptions.o-f29cee1fde664d4683f8c7b9f6ed8bd6: A list of places (Place [*]). Used to defined a place useful for the product (for example a delivery geographical place).
descriptions.o-0d3f638246e04f09befed589406d12bd: A product offering reference. A product offering represents entities that are orderable from the provider of the catalog, this resource includes pricing information
descriptions.o-6c9fce59974b41e09435f85c6c7d0810: A product specification reference. A ProductSpecification is a detailed description of a tangible or intangible object made available externally in the form of a ProductOffering to customers or other parties playing a party role. It may be useful to manage links directly to the ProductSpec, when the product is a non-bundle one you may not manage the ProductOffering link with this Product
descriptions.o-77ae1be5894947b296864ee657143ebe: A a list of name value pairs to list the various relevant characteristics of the instantiated product
descriptions.o-04cff851ac544342b5fcb36967ef9d43: A collection of a number of types of relationships between the product e.g bundle. The value of the ‘type’ attribute should describe the direction of the relationship. E.g. “isContainedIn”
descriptions.o-2ff86290cfe344859aa728f2bc9e25dc: A link to the billing account on which the product is billed. This is optional because in some cases the parent is billed and not all the children
descriptions.o-5ab58881b2b14b12bf69dbccea0445c3: A link to collection of parties. Each party will contain a role and a link
descriptions.o-eca2080decbd46ad97d89225ed267997: List of resource reference. RealizingResource is a link to the resource that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-3f94a740c5fe4259b3e44c9442b2564c: A list of all applicable prices for the product, it’s an override of the default one specified in the ProductOffering
descriptions.o-e1b16ce2d78e40b2b190e98fce7c7bc1: A list of agreement references . Agreement item will contain the terms and conditions for the product including the product term
descriptions.o-674819ad4ccf428a93ff9cc9eac54037: List of service references. RealizingService is a link to the service that realizes the product.
descriptions.o-b4a6b43c21cc4c2cb49cf640d9cef5af: Unique identifier of the product specification
descriptions.o-116cb0d6d38f46869a36c1b74ab7e1d3: Identifier of the line item (generally it is a sequence number 01, 02, 03, ...)
descriptions.o-85a7e741aa764cb39c84708064a74793: A target to the file desribing the place
descriptions.o-c348fcd247334e4983e78a22084f6aaf: Application related code (as defined in the API or from a common list)
descriptions.o-8e75b4aeac5e4794b16190110c807b26: Text that provide more details and corrective actions related to the error. This can be shown to a client user.
descriptions.o-4561f7a3e3214ccb83720c9e484dfde2: The product was previously ACTIVE and a product order to change the product is in progress.
descriptions.o-079bc24e9a7c4b7fb7a026979de4e5fd: Text that explains the reason for error. This can be shown to a client user.
descriptions.o-d44f1d41fa0243809fbe421114c5b506: url pointing to documentation describing the error
descriptions.o-93c9aee7dadb46d499813f39728a4529: The class type of a REST resource
descriptions.o-e55eff38ab0346e4bd945576a0c9b5b0: it provides a link to the schema describing a REST resource
descriptions.o-eae93b4efc34474c88f0bdefb4ee9d63: The product has been successfully installed or has transitioned from a PENDING_CHANGE, SUSPENDED, or PENDING_TERMINATE state.
descriptions.o-a95eafac095447aeba1931a4b07d4ed3: A product has been successfully suspended.
descriptions.o-0d935ce42bc645e7b928671361f2f4fc: The product is in the process of being terminated via a disconnect product order.
descriptions.o-77e5f8cc2a004f16815d0d80f9445c54: The product has been successfully terminated via a disconnect product order.
descriptions.o-3f809ab2b55f49b787cf18d86525646d: The type to which the place is referring. This may be "Site", "FormattedAddress", "FieldedAddress", "ReferencedAddress", or "GeographicLocation".
descriptions.o-79855a8d4ba4470fb83d173edb2c2939: An URL to target a description file
descriptions.o-ac3f3a3a61544181a22068df080899aa: A structure to find a schema describing the product.
descriptions.o-a1f2472f9fad4af08a4c04c363c3fdeb: The product relies on another product.
descriptions.o-d0693bdd61e747d593149c35bd38abf2: The product is a product bundle.
descriptions.o-c929324c41b64c73acf76ce11b0f196f: In the case of a product bundle, a product (e.g. ENNI CE Endpoint) comes from the product that bundles it (e.g Access E-Line).
